pages.text: This entry covers the dungeon market and how to use it. Firstly, you will need to obtain $(h)Merchants$() from dungeons and other loot. Merchants sell goods for $(h)Dungeon Coins$(), but they can only be traded with inside of a dungeon market. You can put the merchant into the market by $(h)Shift + Right Clicking$() the dungeon market.
You can also take a merchant out of the dungeon market by shift right clicking the market with an $(h)Empty Hand$(). Happy trading!
